original_text: After that, Jesus was sitting on the Mount of Olives. He could look across the valley at the temple. Peter, James, John and Andrew went together to talk with him. The crowd was not there.
korean_text: 예수께서 감람 산에서 성전을 마주 대하여 앉으셨을 때에 베드로와 야고보와 요한과 안드레가 조용히 묻되

sentences.original_text: Jesus was sitting on the Mount of Olives.
He could look across the valley at the temple.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 계곡 너머의 성전을 볼 수 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: went together to talk with him.
